GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
rose: check NULL rose_loopback_neigh->loopback

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 9cf85759e104d7e9c3fd8920a554195b715d6797, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 3b3fd068c56e3fbea30090859216a368398e39bf. For more details please see the references link.
